overview: Lola's sister asks her to take a test for her. Mr. Everhard can't believe that she got all the answers right, but Lola still thinks she can learn a few things about life. Dane is patiently waiting for Skylar to show up for her study session. When she arrives very late Dane decides to teach her a thing or two about manners. One of Aaliyah's friends set up a joke on her and Mr. Tate (Manuel Ferrara) saying that she needs help with Sex-Ed. The only thing her friends didn't know is that the joke would be on them. Sara and Johnny have a secret affair going on. Johnny doesn't want to disappoint the school or other teachers if they find out: but Sara on the other hand just wants to fuck in every room in the school.
title: Corrupt Schoolgirls 7
